metadata.title: CVE-2023-47282 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 20.04 LTS (focal) - medium
metadata.description: Out-of-bounds write in Intel Media SDK all versions and some Intel oneVPLsoftware before version 23.3.5 may allow an authenticated user topotentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.

criterions.comment: intel-mediasdk package in focal is affected and may need fixing.
